name: pulumi-az-pipeline-task
description: Azure Pipelines task extension for running Pulumi apps.

scripts.package: yarn --cwd buildAndReleaseTask/ run tsc && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --rev-version
scripts.start: yarn --cwd buildAndReleaseTask/ run tsc && node buildAndReleaseTask/index.js

author: Pulumi
